video.title: The Bernie Mac Show
video.synopsis: Bernie Mac stars in this sitcom as a stand-up comedian who agrees to look after his nieces and nephew when his sister goes into drug rehab.

episodes.synopsis: When Bernie tries to teach Jordan to defend himself, Jordan turns into a bully, causing Bernie to almost mend his own bullying ways.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Despite his valiant efforts to stay healthy, Bernie gets very sick from germs passed around at Bryana's birthday party and misses his Vegas trip.
episodes.title: Now You Got It

episodes.synopsis: Comedian Bernie Mac becomes guardian of his sister's three children, only to realize how much constant attention and love they need.
episodes.title: The Main Event

episodes.synopsis: Bernie Mac's genius with crafts and homemaking qualify him as a new breed of manly-man.
episodes.title: Bernie Mac, Ladies Man

episodes.synopsis: Bernie's scheme to "church" the kids backfires when the church puts too many demands on him.
episodes.title: Saving Bernie Mac

episodes.synopsis: Bernie comes to appreciate Vanessa, Jordan, and Bryana as family rather than mere boarders in his house.
episodes.title: Here to Stay

episodes.synopsis: During the Christmas season, an angel in the form of a dog named Buddy visits the Mac household and sparks selflessness in the children.
episodes.title: A Christmas Story

episodes.synopsis: After much struggle, Bernie gets the kids off to their first day at school.
episodes.title: Starting School

episodes.synopsis: On a hot winter day, tempers flair and Bernie is locked out of the house... until an all-out water fight cools everyone down.
episodes.title: Hot Hot Hot

episodes.synopsis: Bernie initially shuts down Wanda's case of baby fever, but eventually changes his flat "no" to a lukewarm "maybe."
episodes.title: Wanda's Week Off

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa's budding young womanhood rocks the Mac household.
episodes.title: The King and I

episodes.synopsis: Jordan risks his future manhood to get into the Mac Hall of Fame.
episodes.title: Hall of Fame

episodes.synopsis: When Bernie uses family issues as material on a morning radio show, he gets a taste of his own medicine and vows never to do it again.
episodes.title: Handle Your Business

episodes.synopsis: When signs of age afflict Bernie Mac, he fights back and loses.
episodes.title: Back in the Day

episodes.synopsis: When an intruder breaks into his house, Bernie goes to extreme measures to keep the family safe both at home and in public.
episodes.title: Lock Down

episodes.synopsis: When he realizes that the kids are falling behind in cultural and intellectual advancement, Bernie imposes enrichment programs that backfire.
episodes.title: Mac 101

episodes.synopsis: Bernie has to bite his tongue after Social Services investigates his home as potentially "hostile", leading to a delayed explosion.
episodes.title: If I Were N-Riched Man

episodes.synopsis: Bernie learns that although he wants to protect Vanessa and Jordan from the hazards of growing up, he also has to protect their personal rights.
episodes.title: Stop Having Sex

episodes.synopsis: The members of the Mac household are caught in lies that weave a web of deception.
episodes.title: Secrets and Lies

episodes.synopsis: Bernie receives some insight into parenting when Kelly stays with the family and becomes chummy with the kids.
episodes.title: Kelly's Heroes

episodes.synopsis: As their visit to Chicago comes to an end, both Bernie and Vanessa learn enlightening truths about their respective parentage.
episodes.title: Sweet Home Chicago: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As their visit to Chicago comes to an end, both Bernie and Vanessa learn enlightening truths about their respective parentage.
episodes.title: Sweet Home Chicago: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Bernie faces off against Matt Damon and Lucy Lawless during a charity golf match, only to find that his biggest challenge is keeping up with Wanda.
episodes.title: Keep It on the Short Grass

episodes.synopsis: Bernie determines to make Bryana grow up by making her give up her beloved doll, Precious.
episodes.title: Goodbye Dolly

episodes.synopsis: Bernie forces Jordan to befriend a nerd at school... only to discover, to his horror, that the nerd's boring father wants to be Bernie's friend.
episodes.title: Carfool

episodes.synopsis: The kids "unionize" -- and then go on strike -- after Bernie refuses to meet their demands of higher pay for extra chores.
episodes.title: Mac Local 137

episodes.synopsis: When Jordan brings home a three-foot snake as part of a class project, it triggers rancor between him and Bryana... and outright terror in Bernie.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Jungle

episodes.synopsis: Bernie escorts a reluctant Vanessa to a father-daughter dance event; meanwhile Wanda's quiet evening at home with Jordan and Bryana turns into chaos.
episodes.title: Bernic Mac Dance Party

episodes.synopsis: Bernie gets food poisoning on the day of Thanksgiving, plunging him into a nightmarish fantasy world populated by his evil kids.
episodes.title: Tryptophan-tasy

episodes.synopsis: At Bernie's insistence Wanda gets tough with the kids... until her relationship with them begins to deteriorate.
episodes.title: The United Front

episodes.synopsis: Wanda attempts to change Bernie's eating habits after he's diagnosed with high cholesterol.
episodes.title: The Sweet Life

episodes.synopsis: When Jordan declares that he is in fact Jesus Christ, Bernie hopes to set him straight by forcing him to memorize the bible.
episodes.title: Sin Cup

episodes.synopsis: Bernie agrees to go to Wanda's boss' house for dinner, but he can't escape the kids' influence. Meanwhile, things go haywire with the babysitter.
episodes.title: Bernie Mac Rope-a-Dope

episodes.synopsis: Bernie grows concerned when Jordan's obsession for magic shifts to an obsession for Vanessa's friend; Bernie grows nostalgic for his first love.
episodes.title: Magic Jordan

episodes.synopsis: When Bernie realizes that other parents play a huge role in their kids' school projects, he decides to do Jordan's assignment without Jordan's input.
episodes.title: Raging Election

episodes.synopsis: Bernie is determined to make it to Las Vegas so he and his pals can watch a big boxing match, but a series of setbacks threatens to disrupt his plans.
episodes.title: Leaving Los Angeles

episodes.synopsis: Bernie's long-held grudge against joke thief Chris Rock boils to the surface when Bernie's agent gets the pair a spot on The Tonight Show.
episodes.title: Pink Gold

episodes.synopsis: Bernie employs the same strategy used in chess to control the kids, but Jordan soon masters the game and lays a trap during a paint ball tournament.
episodes.title: Chess Wars

episodes.synopsis: Bernie decides to save money by shopping at a grocery store that sells food in bulk, but he's unable to restrain his buying impulses.
episodes.title: The Incredible Bulk

episodes.synopsis: Bernie's new maid finds herself at the mercy of the kids, until Bernie gets wind of the situation and encourages her to launch a counterattack.
episodes.title: Maid Man

episodes.synopsis: When Bernie becomes disgusted with the way the kids waste their Saturdays, he makes Bryana sign up for soccer and Jordan join the Scouts.
episodes.title: Nut Job

episodes.synopsis: When Bernie's sister Benita drops by for a visit, Bernie is pleased to see her... until she begins usurping his role as parent.
episodes.title: The Other Sister

episodes.synopsis: When Wanda's parents visit the Mac household, it doesn't take long for their behavior to irritate Bernie.
episodes.title: Meet the Grandparents

episodes.synopsis: Bernie decides to make Jordan's birthday a memorable one, only to discover that one of Jordan's classmates is having a birthday party on the same day.
episodes.title: For a Few Dollars More

episodes.synopsis: Bernie is overjoyed when Jordan joins the gymnastics team at school, but his enthusiasm vanishes when he finds out that Jordan is a ribbon twirler.
episodes.title: Eye of the Tiger

episodes.synopsis: Bernie clashes with his new neighbor when he builds a tree house for Jordan; Wanda resorts to drastic measures in an effort to keep her car clean.
episodes.title: Love Thy Nephew

episodes.synopsis: When the kids show more interest in receiving gifts than participating in holiday activities, Bernie declares that Christmas has been canceled.
episodes.title: Road to Tradition

episodes.synopsis: Bernie's bid at becoming a serious dramatic actor is torpedoed when people start laughing at his performance.
episodes.title: Laughing Matters

episodes.synopsis: When Bernie takes Jordan to the barbershop so he can observe other African-American guys and learn how to be a man, Jordan lands him in hot water.
episodes.title: Hair Jordan

episodes.synopsis: When Vanessa gets a boyfriend, Bernie disapproves... until the boyfriend takes an interest in getting Jordan involved in sports.
episodes.title: Love Bug

episodes.synopsis: Wanda quits her job when a co-worker is promoted over her, but her presence in the house distracts Bernie as he prepares comedy material.
episodes.title: It's a Wonderful Wife

episodes.synopsis: When Bernie's relatives get on his nerves during a family reunion, he's happy to return home... only to discover that his relatives have followed him.
episodes.title: Family Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Bernie plays an evil wizard in a movie featuring Bryana's favorite character, Droobie, and Bryana thinks it's the real thing.
episodes.title: Droobie or Not Droobie

episodes.synopsis: Father Cronin informs Bernie that Jordan has a gift for spelling, but when Jordan enters a spelling bee, he realizes his true passion is for comedy.
episodes.title: J-O-R-D-A-N Spells Funny

episodes.synopsis: When Wanda says that her parents are having money problems, Bernie decides to buy her father a car... only to find that no good deed goes unpunished.
episodes.title: Make Room for Caddy

episodes.synopsis: When Jordan complains that he has no past, Bernie gives the boy a keepsake and and fibs about it once belonging to Jordan's father.
episodes.title: Saving Sergeant Tompkins

episodes.synopsis: Bernie pulls Bryana out of the private school she's attending after he observes the teachers in action and deems their lessons worthless.
episodes.title: It's Mac-ademic

episodes.synopsis: When Bernie's peaceful vacation doesn't go quite as planned, he decides to fly to Vegas to be with his friends... much to Wanda's chagrin.
episodes.title: The Getaway

episodes.synopsis: Bernie ignores Wanda's concerns and vows to keep his new motorcycle, but a traffic accident prompts a change in attitude.
episodes.title: Easy Rider

episodes.synopsis: Wanda feels neglected when a woman starts hanging out with Bernie, and the kids find the box where Bernie stores the things he's taken from them.
episodes.title: Who's That Lady

episodes.synopsis: After claiming it's impossible for him to fall victim to a prank, Bernie thinks he's accidentally poisoned his neighbor's dog and Jordan's pet rat.
episodes.title: Mac-Inations

episodes.synopsis: Bernie allows Jordan to appear in a television commercial, only to end up regretting his decision.
episodes.title: That Old Mac Magic

episodes.synopsis: Though Jordan is beginning to show an interest in girls, Bernie refuses to talk to the boy about sex, fearing it will only put ideas in his head.
episodes.title: The Talk

episodes.synopsis: When Bryana misbehaves and Bernie doesn't punish her like he does the other kids, Vanessa accuses him of playing favorites.
episodes.title: Five Stages of Bryana

episodes.synopsis: Bernie suspects that his family isn't doing anything special to celebrate his birthday.
episodes.title: Go Bernie, It's Your Birthday

episodes.synopsis: As Thanksgiving approaches, Bernie is certain Vanessa has chosen him as the subject of a school paper focusing on the person she's most thankful for.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: Bernie wires the house with hidden cameras when he grows concerned about Vanessa's behavior.
episodes.title: Big Brother

episodes.synopsis: The school labels Bryana a special-needs student after she injures her jaw in a bike accident, forcing Bernie to chaperone Bryana's field trip.
episodes.title: Stiff Upper Lip

episodes.synopsis: As Bernie prepares for a big comedy show on HBO, the kids prove an unexpected distraction.
episodes.title: Being Bernie Mac

episodes.synopsis: Bernie and Wanda clash when Bernie insists that he's the only one capable of teaching Vanessa how to drive a car.
episodes.title: Mac Overdrive

episodes.synopsis: Bernie builds a new addition to the house after realizing Bryana needs privacy.
episodes.title: My Privacy

episodes.synopsis: Bernie clashes with his brother when his sister Benita gets married at the house; and Wanda ends up planning the wedding she never got to have.
episodes.title: Who Gives This Bride

episodes.synopsis: As Halloween approaches, Bernie and Wanda transfer Bryana to Jordan's school after she does poorly in state standardized testing.
episodes.title: Nerdy Mac

episodes.synopsis: One of Wanda's friends tells Bernie that Wanda wants a diamond for her birthday; and Bernie shows Jordan the ins-and-outs of poker.
episodes.title: Stone Nuts

episodes.synopsis: When Bernie grows worried about Vanessa's choice of friends, he enrolls the kids in a group dedicated to the enrichment of African-American youth.
episodes.title: Jack & Jacqueline

episodes.synopsis: Bernie is charmed by Vanessa's boyfriend... until he discovers the boy is raising a baby.
episodes.title: Manchild in Vanessa Land

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa is chosen for the high school's spirit squad, but Bernie is shocked by the team's decidedly risqué dance routine.
episodes.title: You Don't Know Squad

episodes.synopsis: When a little girl injures her arm during Bryana's birthday party, Bernie finds himself facing a lawsuit, and being labeled a negligent parent.
episodes.title: You Got Served

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa accuses Bernie of using a double standard after he prevents her from going to a rap concert filled with girl-hungry boys.
episodes.title: I Don't Wanna Be a Playa No More

episodes.synopsis: Tensions mount when Bernie shares an assistant with Wanda; and Jordan uses Bernie's Rolodex to phone a celebrity wrestler.
episodes.title: The Big Picture

episodes.synopsis: Bernie discovers that Vanessa is a talented singer, but his efforts to improve her self-confidence backfire.
episodes.title: The Music Mac

episodes.synopsis: Complications ensue after Bernie gives Jordan permission to walk home from school, and Wanda comforts Vanessa after her classmates see her topless.
episodes.title: Walk Like a Man

episodes.synopsis: When Bryana's birthfather shows up, intent on being her friend, Bernie teaches him that what Bryana really needs is someone to discipline her.
episodes.title: Father Knows Best

episodes.synopsis: Scrawny Jordan ends up winning  all of his wrestling matches because the other teams don't have anyone in his weight class.
episodes.title: Wrestling with a Sticky Situation

episodes.synopsis: After calling Vanessa a quitter, Bernie challenges her to finish a 10K race; and Bernie thinks Jordan is making body parts out of clay.
episodes.title: Marathon Mac

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa is forced to take a job at Bernie's company after she runs up a debt on his credit cards.
episodes.title: The Big Payback

episodes.synopsis: Bernie is convinced that Vanessa is going to end up in trouble after she buys a car, and Jordan tricks Wanda into driving him to a comic convention.
episodes.title: Car Wars

episodes.synopsis: Bernie lets Jordan baby-sit Bryana, but Jordan is more interested in watching a scary movie. Wanda accidentally exposes herself during an auction.
episodes.title: Night of Terror

episodes.synopsis: Bernie shows Wanda how to intimidate the kids with Big Mama's belt; and Bernie gets a state-of-the-art home entertainment system.
episodes.title: For Whom the Belt Tolls

episodes.synopsis: Bernie buys a BB gun when a possum shows up at the house; and Bernie clashes with Bryana's father as he tries to show Jordan how to barbecue.
episodes.title: Pop Pop Goes the Weasel

episodes.synopsis: Bernie sentences Jordan and Bryana to a prison-like punishment after they misbehave, and then begins a CSI-style investigation for clues.
episodes.title: Prison Break

episodes.synopsis: Bernie takes the family to a church retreat after Wanda notices that everyone is drifting apart; and Wanda tells Bernie she wants a child of her own.
episodes.title: Some Church Bull

episodes.synopsis: Fearing that Bernie's sister will one day return to take the children away, Wanda tells Bernie she wants to officially adopt the kids.
episodes.title: Sorely Missed

episodes.synopsis: After Bernie bonds with Vanessa's friend from Chicago, Vanessa extends an olive branch in an effort to mend fences with her uncle.
episodes.title: Fumes of Détente

episodes.synopsis: Bernie grows increasingly frustrated as Wanda's efforts to conceive fail time and again.
episodes.title: Exercise in Fertility: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Wanda's pregnancy test comes back positive, the kids grow convinced that they're going to be replaced once the baby is born.
episodes.title: Exercise in Fertility: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Bernie and Jordan join forces to play fantasy football; and Bryana takes an interest in applying makeup after Vanessa throws a makeup party.
episodes.title: Fantasy Football

episodes.synopsis: Jordan and a new Jewish friend begin crashing bar mitzvahs; and Wanda and Vanessa play a joke on Bryana after she eavesdrops on conversations.
episodes.title: Bar Mitzvah Crashers

episodes.synopsis: Bernie tries to arrange for a devout Christian who has yet to lose his virginity to take Vanessa to the prom, and Jordan resents Bryana's attention.
episodes.title: Who's Your Mama?

episodes.synopsis: Bryan helps out Bernie while Wanda is away on a business trip, and Jordan tries to convince his classmates he's got the best smile.
episodes.title: What Would Jason Do?

episodes.synopsis: Bernie is shocked to discover that Jordan is dating a cheerleader, and in order to have some time for herself, Wanda lets Bryana hang around Vanessa.
episodes.title: It's Never as Bad as the First Time

episodes.synopsis: Complications ensue when Wanda's little sister Valerie throws Wanda a 1970s-themed skating party.
episodes.title: Spinning Wheels

episodes.synopsis: Bernie and Wanda try to help Vanessa improve her SAT scores, but Vanessa seems more interested in working at the coffee shop.
episodes.title: Growing Pains

episodes.synopsis: After an electric shock sends him to a hospital, Bernie suddenly makes an effort to teach the children everything he knows.
episodes.title: Bernie's Angels
